@graph.name: Kahani Storybooks
@graph.description: Kahani creates personalized children's storybooks and figurines. Transform your child's photo into a magical Pixar-inspired storybook character with handcrafted quality and love.

@graph.name: Kahani - Personalized Children's Storybooks
@graph.description: Transform your child's photos into magical personalized storybooks and figurines. Handcrafted with Pixar-inspired quality.

@graph.name: Digital Storybook PDF
@graph.description: Personalized digital storybook featuring your child as the main character in Pixar-inspired illustrations.

@graph.name: Printed Personalized Storybook
@graph.description: Premium printed storybook with your child as the main character, featuring high-quality binding and Pixar-inspired illustrations.

@graph.name: Full Playset with Storybook and Figurine
@graph.description: Complete personalized experience including printed storybook, custom figurine of your child, and collectible packaging.

acceptedAnswer.text: Kahani creates personalized children's storybooks and figurines. We transform your child's photo into a magical Pixar-inspired character in a custom storybook, available as digital PDF, printed book, or complete playset with figurine.
Kahani offers three products: Digital PDF for $9.99, Printed Storybook for $32.99, and Full Playset with figurine for $35.99.

mainEntity.name: What age range is Kahani suitable for?

acceptedAnswer.text: Kahani storybooks and figurines are designed for children ages 3-10 years old.
Yes, Kahani is family-safe and privacy-conscious. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. Our website is intended for parents and guardians.
You can email us at team@vsnagra.com or use our contact form at https://www.kahanistorybooks.com/contact

@graph.name: Contact Kahani
@graph.description: Get in touch with Kahani Storybooks for questions about personalized children's books and figurines.

@graph.name: Privacy Policy - Kahani
@graph.description: Kahani's privacy policy explains how we handle your information and protect children's privacy.
